summary: This is a brief email from August 30, 2019, referencing scheduled legal meetings, specifically a 'second proffer' session with a lawyer on Thursday and a talk with an attorney the following Friday and week. It indicates ongoing legal strategy discussions.

events.title: Second Proffer Session with Lawyer
events.description: A meeting described as a 'second proffer' session with a lawyer, likely part of ongoing legal negotiations or cooperation discussions.

events.title: Scheduled Talk with Attorney
events.description: A talk with an attorney was scheduled for Friday at 2:30 PM, with further discussions planned for the following week.

keyFacts: The email is dated August 30, 2019, shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody.
It references a 'second proffer' session, indicating an ongoing series of cooperation discussions with legal authorities.
The correspondence shows active legal planning and attorney consultations were taking place at this time.
